summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Improvement of Lake City Way N.E. between N.E. 78th St. and N.E. 98th St.; authorizing the execution of agreements with the Washington State Urban Arterial Board for Financial Assistance therefor; making an appropriation from the Arterial Development Fund; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department.
